summary: vulkan bug fix and enhancement update
details:
The vulkan packages contain the reference ICD loader and validation layers for Vulkan, a graphics and compute API for cross-platform access to modern GPUs.

Bug Fix(es) and Enhancement(s):

* Rebase vulkan-loader in 8.5 (BZ#1952989)

* Rebase vulkan-headers in 8.5 (BZ#1952990)

* Rebase spirv-headers in 8.5 (BZ#1952991)

* Rebase spirv-tools in 8.5 (BZ#1952992)

* Rebase glslang in 8.5 (BZ#1952993)

* Rebase vulkan-tools in 8.5 (BZ#1952994)

* Rebase vulkan-validation-layers in 8.5 (BZ#1952995)
